definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: See publication AV-4, Actuated Thermoplastic Valves, for detailed information.
sentences.chinese: 參閱“執行機構驅動熱塑性閥門”，瞭解詳細資料。

sentences.english: Brain scientists call this process neuro-plasticity.
sentences.chinese: 腦科學家給這個過程叫神經可塑性。

sentences.english: ABS resin is a kind of thermoplastic resin with excellent allround properties.
sentences.chinese: ABS樹脂是一種綜合性能優異的熱塑性樹脂。

sentences.english: Neuronal plasticity or synaptic plasticity is maximal during brain development and still exists in adult brain.
sentences.chinese: 腦發育過程中其可塑性最強，成年腦仍具有可塑性。

sentences.english: Neuronal plasticity or synaptic plasticity is maximal during brain development and still exists in adult brain.
sentences.chinese: 腦發育過程中其可塑性最強，成年腦仍具有可塑性。

sentences.english: After nerve injury, the nerve function can be compensated by axonal plasticity .
sentences.chinese: 腦外傷後神經損傷可通過軸突的可塑性來代償其功能。

sentences.english: The shale beds in between generally deform plastically.
sentences.chinese: 夾在其中的頁岩層通常是塑性變形。

sentences.english: A kind of plastic theory of sinter is presented in this article.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一種燒結體塑性理論。

sentences.english: It appears to be a team-colored thermoplastic helmet, of the variety typically associated with firefighters.
sentences.chinese: 外型是頂根據隊伍決定顏色的熱塑性消防員頭盔。

sentences.english: Every time we recall a long-term memory, it becomes malleable.
sentences.chinese: 每當我們回憶起一段長期記憶，它都是具有可塑性的。

sentences.english: This machine is designed for cutting belts of natural rubber and other plastic materials.
sentences.chinese: 本機適用於切割天然膠塊和其它各種塑性材料。

sentences.english: Other proof of the plasticity of carrot was also forthcoming.
sentences.chinese: 胡羅卜可塑性的其他證明也垂手可得。

sentences.english: The gneissic structures are formed by the stress and are the results of plastic deformation.
sentences.chinese: 片麻構造形成與應力作用和塑性變形有關。

sentences.english: The growth behavior of Zoysia japonica showed strong plasticity and foraging trait.
sentences.chinese: 結縷草的生長行爲表現出很強的可塑性和覓養特性。

sentences.english: This paper describes the lower bound theory of 3-D plastic limit analysis.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了三維塑性極限分析下限法的基本原理。

sentences.english: The strain-fatigue-life of materials is related to the plastic strain at the crack-tip.
sentences.chinese: 材料的應變疲勞壽命與裂端的塑性應變有關。
